==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かん|しん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|関|sc=Jpan|tr=kan||concern}} + {{m|ja|心|sc=Jpan|tr=shin||heart}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かんしん}}
# [[concern]], [[interest]]

====Derived terms====
* [[関心事]] (''kanshinji''): matter of concern and interest
* [[無関心]] (''mukanshin''): apathy, indifference

====Idioms====
* [[関心を呼ぶ]] (''kanshin o yobu''): be the subject of attention
* [[関心を高める]] (''kanshin o takameru''): raise awareness of
* [[関心が高まる]] (''kanshin ga takamaru''): to take a growing interest in
